definition: Luzhou prefecture-level city in Sichuan
old name of a river in Jiangxi/place name
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
Luzhou prefecture-level city in Sichuan

sentences.english: In Luzhou city proper, there are seven long-distance bus stations in total.
Luzhou aged fermentation pit, built by yellow mud, is called "Jiujiao"(the pit for fermenting grains ).
sentences.chinese: 瀘州老窖是用黃泥建造的，稱爲酒窖。

sentences.english: Song said, while Luzhou in Sichuan Province has shown interest.
sentences.chinese: 四川省瀘州市對此也表現出興趣。

sentences.english: It is bordered by Chongqing and Chengdu in the east and the north, sharing boundary with the southern Guizhou Province and western Yunnan Province.
sentences.chinese: 瀘州東接重慶，北鄰成都，南靠貴州，西連雲南。

sentences.english: Objective To identify the compositions of volatile oil from Luzhou Flos Lonicerae.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究瀘州地區產山銀花揮發油的化學成分。

sentences.english: Luzhou Airport is the second largest airport in Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 瀘州機場是四川第二大的機場。

sentences.english: The characteristics of aged cellar mud was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了瀘州老窖老窖池的窖泥特性。

sentences.english: It is bordered by Chongqing and Chengdu in the east and the north. Luzhou also shares boundaries in the south with Guizhou Province and in the west with Yunnan Province.
sentences.chinese: 瀘州東接重慶，北鄰成都，南靠貴州，西連雲南。

sentences.english: If you people can pack a taxi to Luzhou, about 600 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 如果你人多，可以包的士去瀘州，大概要600元。
